caption.p: The effects of COVID-19 on various aspects of agriculture in different countries of the world.

tr.td: Decline in the agriculture sectors by 4%
10%, 8% and 15% fall in corn, soybean and livestock prices respectively
Decrease in GDP of the agriculture and food system by 7%, unemployment of 46 million agricultural workers
31% decrease in imports of agricultural products, 5% reduction in livestock production, 35% increase in price of fruits and nuts and economic losses of 500 million USD
Rice and wheat production decrease of about 24% and economic losses totaling 1.5 billion USD
A 14% fall in gross domestic product (GDP) of agriculture
A decline in coffee trade compared to 2019 and 2018 of 32% and 26% respectively
Decrease in GDP of agriculture and natural resources of 3% and 1%, respectively
